channel.title: scikit-image on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in scikit-image on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] [Python] Image processing with scikit-image
item.description: ## Read image file In [5]: from skimage import io In [6]: I = io.imread('lena512color.tiff') In [7]: print I.shape (512, 512, 3) Writing image files In [12]: io.imsave('output.bmp', I) Writing multiple image files The tiff format allows you to save multiple image files as one file, as shown below. In [13]: I1 = io.imread('Lenna.bmp') In [14]: I2 = io.imread('Mandrill.bmp') In [15]: I3 = io.imread('Parrots.bmp') In [16]: io.imsave('output.tiff', [I1, I2, I3]) In [17]: I4 = io.
